Text: Why not just in english, and is there a way where I can only hear english?

Just download VLC player ,go to audio and click 

on the English(American)audio

Works perfectly !!

Thank you for uploading Milliman 

Regards Kenneth John

Great series, the quality is OK from a 1080 hi def screen(i know its an unfair comparison but some 720p work great on 1080 def). and yeah just remember that you not the only person in the world so you have to change it to audio track 2 for English to get rid of dubbed Russian.
